statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ -8 \\ -8 \\ -16 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 14 \\ 18 \\ 28 \\ 44 \\ -37 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
